name: PowerFlip YAODL 3D Image File
summary: Learn about .YDL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: YDL is short for YAODL, which is an acronym for "Yet Another Object Description Language." Silicon Graphics, the developer of the YAODL file format, no longer uses YAODL files.

description: 3D model used by PowerFlip, a program used to view and rotate three-dimensional models; may include polygons, quad-meshes, NURBS, texture coordinates, and object properties; supports colors for objects, facets, and vertices.
